Hi,
    I have a requirement to run inlined/external Javascript code on the=
 HTML page contents obtained by Heritrix crawler and store back the modifie=
d HTML contents after executing Javascript code. I have been working with H=
eritrix 3.0. I found the following project which has implemented the Javasc=
ript execution on the HTMl contents. 

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/dis=
play/Heritrix/Web+Spam+Detection+for+Heritrix

I did download the code howe=
ver, I was not able to run the same. I went throught the HOW-TO-LAUNCH-Heri=
trix file and tried to run the same by the heritrix launch  srcipt in /dist=
/src/main/bin. However, I get the following error:

ls: ~/Downloads/jennifu=
l_gsoc08/heritrix2/dist/src/main/lib/*.jar: No such file or directory
WARNI=
NG: $HERITRIX_HOME/conf/jmxremote.password not found.
WARNING: Disabling re=
mote JMX.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/ar=
chive/crawler/Heritrix
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.arc=
hive.crawler.Heritrix
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoad=
er.java:202)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native =
Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:19=
0)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
       =
 at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
        a=
t java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248)
Could not find the =
main class: org.archive.crawler.Heritrix.  Program will exit.


This is due=
 to the absence of the lib folder. If anyone has used this, could you pleas=
e tell me if we need to do some build before running the code.

Also if the=
re is some other way in which I could perfrom the required execution of Jav=
aScript.

Thanking You,
Pankaj
